body.title: Project Description
body.text:
This is a 3rd year project at Epitech which consists of calculating the result of a mathematical expression in Haskell.

The expression must be calculated with the priority rules of parentheses and operators.

The program takes into account in the expression the operators:

  • + Plus sign
  • - Minus sign
  • * Multiplier
  • / Division
  • ^ Exponent sign
